Reviews.Content: Great little hotel We stayed here for 5 days over New Year. The staff did not speak a lot of English but were very helpful and went out of their way to help us. The hotel was warm and clean and very well located although hard to find - we travelled from Beijing airport on the bus and then on foot to the hotel. Not many tourists in this area but very close to the subway which was excellent
Reviews.Author: roblizBrisbane
